yaml.title: Analysis
yaml.description: Prepare the data, analyse or model it and review until the agreed outputs in problem definition are produced and approved.
yaml.image-alt: Photo by Emily Morter on Unsplash

markdown.markdown:
![](section_3_diagram.png){width=100%}

In this stage we prepare data, analyse it and review until outputs as specified in the problem definition are finalised. It is sometimes necessary to go back and refine the problem definition as a result of discoveries or issues found during these tasks.
